explanation: Despite some neutral and bearish voices, the majority of opinions and sentiment around BTC in this live chat are positive or bullish, citing strong bounces, uptrend continuation, multiple users entering or holding long positions, and external factors such as institutional support (Fidelity news) and expectations of rate cuts. Many participants report switching their capital to BTC from alts, and repeated 'buy' calls, as well as technical levels being respected, reinforce the bullish view. The overall trader psychology leans towards expecting further upside, with only a minority discussing downside or ranging scenarios.
